Reviews.Title: “Didn't sleep for 2 nights”
Reviews.Author: Loopy L
Reviews.Content: youre looking hotel cheap fairly central location youre looking else dont wont main gripes beds uncomfortable thin unsupportive mattress hard base curtains flimsy seethrough barely stretched length window lots light poured etc middle night window stuffy disturbed refuse collections immediately outside building 7am lots noise traffic street outside hours ensuite bathroom shared 10 sink bedroom fine except floor bathrooms gender label womens bathroom using choice closer bedrooms shower cubicle seethrough glass shower exposing yourself toiletsink potentially genders lock door meant sink toilet youre shower especially annoyed couldnt sink clean teeth 2 boys locked door womens bathroom shower minor gripes decor shabby didnt feel clean towels thin bit grubby 2 stars cheap price staff friendly dont tight budget degree comfort stay recommend staying else

Reviews.Title: “Going to Berlin?”
Reviews.Author: GeorgesPiriou
Reviews.Content: six months ago spent week sister hotel closer airport hotel pleasant surprise dont miss somewhat fashioned reasonably confortable unbelievably unexpensive location steps zoologischer garten station sbahn underground buses 100200 cheap touristic tour acceptably clean simply furnished surprises didnt expect frills nor whistles enjoy

Reviews.Content: ive hotel weekend impression compared price hotel night badly equipped wall paint quality outdoor furniture maintenance hair dryer bathroom internet wifi time finnaly 10 euros breakfast hand staff greeted wonderful giving information idea free coffe morning anyway hotel located near metro station shop bad impression structure hotel return berlin return hotels unavailable

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable city hotel”
Reviews.Author: doe1106
Reviews.Content: comfortable city hotel exploring berlin near station garden buses 100 200 tegel airport half hour wifi quality hotel lobby computer printer free fruit lot shops famous kadewe quarter price 24 euros excellent hotel nearby cafes expensive

Reviews.Title: “Value for money at the heart of Berlin”
Reviews.Author: thomaser
Reviews.Content: stay hotel pleasant brother stayed 5 days whilst attending itb berlin 2 girls woman reception friendly willing help issue – directions restaurants etc biggest usp location located heart berlin hotel stones throw metro station bahn bus station europa centre irish pub adequate 2 people overly spacious bathrooms clean dry hot cold water served exact menu breakfast day stayed maybe indian daily breakfast fare cold meats pastries bread duly skipped whilst wouldn’t rate hotel benchmark luxury berlin 90 euro night value proposition

Reviews.Title: “Good price Great location”
Reviews.Author: gr2k
Reviews.Content: hotel 5 minutes walking distance su zoologischer garten station youre lucky view memorial church outside window shared bath clean despite basic hotel tv channels german plenty ac outlets wardrobe signal accessible 3rd floor reception theres computer guest internet hosted view quick ads using issue internet speed fast definitely trip berlin

Reviews.Title: “Clean, safe, affordable & great location.”
Reviews.Author: smkTraveler
Reviews.Content: clean safe low frills hotel location staff friendly speaks english nice hotel price hostel highly recommend location hotel location bombed memorial church tiergarten shops sbahn transport hotel double private bathroom basic ikea furniture tv bed comfortable sheets towels clean provided soap shampoo packets hairdryer bathroom internet wifi internet upstairs corner building wasnt walk lounge stairwell connection phone computer guests lounge free coffee fruit breakfast breakfast morning 10 euro basic german spread mornings chose nearby bakeries instead recommend hotel family friends berlin stay

Reviews.Title: “Very good, basic accommodation. Perfect for a city break.”

Reviews.Content: accomodation perfect city break clean beds comfortable staff helpful free coffee reception nice touch gripe night door left cleaners belongings id definitely book hotel location
